author: Joel Khalili
title: The World’s Biggest Bitcoin Mine Is Rattling This Texas Oil Town
description: A cash-strapped city in rural Texas will soon be home to the world’s largest bitcoin mine. Local protesters are “raising hell.”

author: Samantha Kelly
title: PayPal to Allow Businesses Buy and Sell Crypto
description: A cash-strapped city in rural Texas will soon be home to the world’s largest bitcoin mine. Local protesters are “raising hell.”
content:
It's about to get easier for US merchants to use cryptocurrency for payments. PayPal is launching a new service to allow the businesses that use its platform to buy, hold and sell crypto.
